headline: US Senate passes tax bill to boost chip industry incentives
summary: The legislation raises the investment tax credit for chipmakers to 35% from 25%, surpassing the 30% increase proposed in an earlier draft.

headline: Bernstein SocGen Affirms ‘Outperform’ Rating on Micron Technology (MU) Amid HBM Opportunity
summary: Micron Technology (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the 13 best blue-chip stocks to buy, according to analysts. On June 27, analysts at Bernstein SocGen Group reiterated an ‘Outperform’ rating on the stock and a $140 price target. The research firm’s bullish stance is in response to the company’s better-than-expected performance in the high-bandwidth memory segment. The […]

headline: Morgan Stanley sees improved outlook for TSMC’s U.S. investment under new policy
summary: Investing.com -- TSMC’s U.S. expansion plans received a boost from newly enhanced tax incentives, which could ease the long-term profitability burden of its Arizona chip fabrication plants, according to Morgan Stanley.
